name: Construction materials and methods
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session examines the balance to be struck between embodied energy in construction and a material's energy-saving credentials and therefore overall contribution to the building's energy efficiency levels. By use of case study examples, it will also consider the benefits of using natural materials in self-build projects.
